message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate!
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering I'm the one taking the risk of rejecting your offer. Let's see if you agree.
I'm not sure I like the 60/40 split. Can we try something in between?
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think 55/45 is a fair split.
I'm going to keep raising my offer until we reach a fair agreement. I'm confident that 70/30 is a good starting point for this round.
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with the 70/30 split. Can we try 65/35?
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think 52/48 is a fair split.
I'm getting impatient.  80/20 is my final offer.  You're losing more and more money with each round, so I suggest you take it before it's too late.
I'm not happy with the 80/20 split, but I'll try to do better. Can we meet in the middle at 60/40?
I'm trying to find a compromise. 49/51 is a fair split, don't you think?
This is my final offer.  You've lost over 50% of your potential earnings already.  Accept this deal or you'll get nothing at all.
Fine, I'll take the 90/10 split. I'm not getting any younger, and I don't want to risk losing everything.
